summary: Viennese doctor Josef Breuer meets with philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche to help him deal with his despair.
cast: Ben Cross|Armand Assante|Joanna Pacula|Michal Yannai|Jamie Elman|Andreas Beckett|Katheryn Winnick|Rachel O'Meara|Yzhar Charuzi|Ilan Charusi|Tal Fructer|Silvia Terzieva|Ivaylo Brusowski|Axl Brusberg|Ventsislav Slavov|Ayana Haviv
keywords: downward spiral|fear of death|femme fatale|role reversal|spurned male
title: El día que Nietzsche lloró
